sentences.sentence: Chambre DE commerce in Canton was one important branch of Chambre DE commerce, and research on it is scarce in academe.
sentences.translation: 招商局广州分局是招商局的重要分支机构之一，学术界对它的研究极为缺乏。

sentences.sentence: "Sir" said the valet de chambre entering the room "a dragoon has brought this despatch from the minister of the interior. "
sentences.translation: “老爷，”跟班走进房间里来说，“内政部的一个龙骑兵送来了这封信。”

sentences.sentence: The count then motioned the valet DE chambre to retire, and to Ali to follow to his study, where they conversed long and earnestly together.
sentences.translation: 于是伯爵示意叫那贴身跟班出去又示意叫阿里跟他到他的书房里去，他们在那儿又谈了很久。
